QuestData.Title: The Battle of Bloodfire Ravine
QuestData.Description:
It is time to strike out and end de blood troll threat once and for all!
We travel back to Bloodfire Ravine, and dis time it is de blood trolls who will be sent running.
Mount up, and together we will show dem we are a force to be reckoned with!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Molaka's death will cripple the Blood Troll's hold on Bloodfire Ravine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Bloodfire Ravine from the Blood Trolls.
